src_sent:
Andhra Pradesh is a beautiful state in India, suitable for various adventure sports. The state has many popular adventure sports and recreational activities. As part of this, river rafting is a popular activity in Andhra Pradesh, with many rivers famous for rafting, including the Krishna, Godavari, and Sabari rivers. These rivers have powerful currents, making rafting an exciting and challenging experience.

Similarly, trekking is another popular activity in Andhra Pradesh, with many beautiful mountain ranges and forests. These are great places for trekking, and some of the famous trekking destinations in the state include the Papikondalu National Park, Alluri Sitarama Raju National Park, and the Kotagiri Hills.

Camping is also a popular activity in Andhra Pradesh, with many great places to camp. Some of the famous camping destinations in the state include the Papikonda National Park, Alluri Sitarama Raju National Park, and many places along the Godavari River.

Another unique traditional sport in Andhra Pradesh is the "Neti Kreedalu" or "Neti Sports". In this sport, players throw a rope from one hill to another and then use the rope to jump from one hill to another. Neti Kreedalu is a very exciting and challenging experience.

There are also other popular adventure sports in Andhra Pradesh, including hiking, boating, cycling, scuba diving, paragliding, polo, football, and kabaddi. When visiting Andhra Pradesh, you can choose the right adventure sport or recreational activity that suits your interests.
tgt_sent: ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్ భారతదేశంలోని ఒక అందమైన రాష్ట్రం ఇది వివిధ రకాల సాహస క్రీడలకు అనుకూలమైనది రాష్ట్రంలోని అన్నీ జనాదరణ పొందిన సాహస క్రీడలు మరియు వినోద కార్యకలాపాలు చాలా ఉన్నాయి దీనిలో భాగంగా రివర్ [river] రాఫ్టింగ్ [rafting] ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్‌లోని అనేక నదులు రాఫ్టింగ్ [rafting] కోసం ప్రసిద్ధి చెందాయి వీటిలో కృష్ణానది గోదావరి నది మరియు శబరి నది ఉన్నాయి ఈ నదులు శక్తివంతమైన ప్రవాహాలను కలిగి ఉంటాయి ఇవి రాఫ్టింగ్‌ను ఉత్తేజకరమైన మరియు సవాళ్ళతో కూడుకున్న అనుభవంగా చెప్పవచ్చు అలాగే ట్రెక్కింగ్ [trekking] ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్లో అనేక అందమైన పర్వత శ్రేణులు మరియు అడవులు కూడా ఉన్నాయి ఇవి ట్రెక్కింగ్ [trekking] కోసం గొప్ప ప్రదేశాలు కూడా రాష్ట్రంలోని కొన్ని ప్రసిద్ధ ట్రెక్కింగ్ [trekking] గమ్యస్థానాలు పాపికొండలు జాతీయ ఉద్యానవనం అల్లూరి సీతారామరాజు జాతీయ ఉద్యానవనం మరియు కోటగిరి కొండలు అలాగే కాంపింగ్ [comping] ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్‌లోని అనేక ప్రదేశాలు కాంపింగ్ [comping] కోసం గొప్ప ప్రదేశాలు రాష్ట్రంలోని కొన్ని ప్రసిద్ధ కాంపింగ్‌లు గమ్యస్థానాలు పాపికొండ జాతీయ ఉద్యానవనం అల్లూరి సీతారామరాజు జాతీయ ఉద్యానవనం మరియు గోదావరి నది ఒడ్డున ఉన్న చాలా ప్రదేశాలు అలాగే మరి ముఖ్యంగా నేటిక్ క్రీడలు కూడా నేటిక్ క్రీడలు ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్‌కు చెందిన ఒక ప్రత్యేకమైన సాంప్రదాయ క్రీడ ఈ క్రీడలో ఆటగాళ్ళు ఒక కొండ నుండి మరొక కొండకు ఒక తాడును విసిరేస్తారు ఆపై ఆ తాడును ఉపయోగించి ఒక కొండ నుండి మరొక కొండకు దూకేస్తారు నేటిక్ క్రీడలు చాలా ఉత్తేజకరమైన మరియు సవాళ్ళతో కూడుకున్న అనుభవం ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్‌‌లోని ఇతర జనాధారణ పొందిన సాహస క్రీడలు కూడా ఉన్నాయి దానిలో హైకింగ్ [hiking] బోటింగ్ [boating] సైక్లింగ్ [cycling] స్కోబా [scuba] డ్రైవింగ్ [driving] పారాగ్లైడింగ్ [paragliding] పోలో[polo] ఫుట్‌బాల్ [football] కబడీ [kabaddi] ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్‌ను సందర్శించేటప్పుడు మీరు మీ ఆ ఆస్తులకు అనుగుణంగా మీకు సరైన సాహస క్రీడ లేదా వినోద కార్యకలాపాన్ని ఎంచుకోవచ్చు

src_sent:
The climate in East Godavari district is generally tropical, with temperatures reaching up to 40 degrees Celsius in summer and not dropping below 10 degrees Celsius in winter. The rainfall is usually over 1,000 millimeters per year, with most of it coming during the summer months. East Godavari district is a fertile region, making it suitable for agriculture, which is the main source of livelihood for the people. The winter season is mild and pleasant, making it an ideal time for farming. During this time, farmers engage in activities such as planting seeds, watering crops, and removing weeds.

In contrast, the hot and humid climate during the summer months hampers crop growth. Farmers have to put in extra effort to water their crops and control pests. The changing seasons also affect the daily lives of the people living in East Godavari district. In winter, people wear light clothing and spend more time outdoors, while in summer, they wear cooler clothing and stay indoors for longer periods.

In recent years, changes in the climate have been observed in East Godavari district, with temperatures rising higher in summer and rainfall decreasing. These changes have a negative impact on agriculture and the population. The climate and seasons in East Godavari district have a significant impact on the lives of the people living in the region, and these effects are expected to become more severe in the future due to climate change.
tgt_sent: తూర్పుగోదావరి జిల్లాలో వాతావరణం సాధారణంగా ఉష్ణ మండల మైదానం వేసవిలో ఉష్ణోగ్రతలు నలభై డిగ్రీల సెల్సియస్ [celsius] వరకు చేరుకుంటాయి అయితే శీతాకాలంలో అవి పది డిగ్రీల సెల్సియస్ [celsisu] కంటే తక్కువగా ఉండవు వర్షపాతం సాధారణంగా ఏడాదికి వెయ్యి మిల్లీ [milli] మీటర్ల కంటే ఎక్కువగా ఉంటుంది ఎక్కువగా వేసవిలో వస్తుంది తూర్పుగోదావరి జిల్లా వ్యవసాయానికి జీవనదారం శీతాకాలం తేలికపాటి మరియు ఆహ్లాదకరమైన వాతావరణం వల్ల పంటలను సాగు చేయడానికి ఇది అనుకూలమైన సమయం ఈ సమయంలో రైతులు తమ పొలాలలో విత్తనాలు నాటడం మొక్కలను నీరుకు పెట్టడం మరియు కలుపుని తొలగించడం వంటి పనులు చేస్తారు వేసవిలో వేడి మరియు తేమ వాతావరణం వల్ల పంటలు పెరుగుదల దెబ్బతింటుంది ఈ సమయంలో రైతులు తమ పంటలను నీరు పెట్టడానికి మరియు తెగుళ్ళను నియంత్రించడానికి ఎక్కువ కృషి చేయాలి కాలాలు తూర్పుగోదావరి జిల్లాలో నివసించే ప్రజల రోజు వారి జీవితాలను కూడా ప్రభావితం చేస్తాయి శీతాకాలంలో ప్రజలు తేలికపాటి దుస్తులను ధరిస్తారు [talking] మరియు బయట ఎక్కువ సమయం గడుపుతారు వేసవిలో ప్రజలు చల్లని దుస్తులను ధరిస్తారు మరియు ఎక్కువ సమయం ఇంట్లో గడుపుతారు కొన్ని సంవత్సరాలలో తూర్పుగోదావరి జిల్లాలో వాతావరణంలో మార్పులు కనిపిస్తాయి వేసవిలో ఉష్ణోగ్రతలు మరింత ఎక్కువగా మరియు వర్షా పాతం తక్కువగా ఉంది ఉంటుంది ఈ మార్పులు వ్యవసాయం మరియు జనాభా పై ప్రతికూల ప్రభావం చూపుతాయి తూర్పుగోదావరి జిల్లాలో వాతావరణం మరియు కాలాలు ఈ ప్రాంతాల్లోని ప్రజలు జీవితాలపై గణనీయమైన ప్రభావాన్ని చూపుతున్నాయి భవిష్యత్తులో వాతావరణ మార్పులు కారణంగా ఈ ప్రభావాలు మరింత తీవ్రం అవుతాయని అంచన

tgt_sent: రోజూ ఆహారంలో పాలు [uhh] ఆకుకూరలు పు పళ్ళు అవి తీసుకుంటాం దాని వల్ల ఆకుకూరలలో ఐరన్ [iron] ఉంటుంది అది శరీరానికి ఎంతో ఉపయోగపడుతుంది రక్తహీనత లేకుండా ఉంటుంది [uhh] నాణ్యమైన కూరగాయలు అంటే పెరట్లో పండించుకున్న కూరగాయలు తినడం వల్ల రోగాలు దరిచేరకుండా ఉంటాయి [uhh] సొంతంగా పండిస్తాం కాబట్టి ఎరువులు ఏమి వాడం కాబట్టి [noise] అవి ఆరోగ్యానికి చాలా మంచిది అలాగే చిరుధాన్యాలు వచ్చి మొలకెత్తించుకుని తింటాము దానిలో అధికంగా పోషకాలు ఉంటాయి అయి శరీరానికి మంచి ఆరోగ్యాన్ని శక్తిని ఇస్తాయి నాణ్యమైన బియ్యం అంటే బియ్యం పండించిన బియ్యం ఆడించుకుని పొట్టు తీసి తింటాం కాబట్టి అవి చాలా [clanging] ఉపయోగకరంగా ఉంటాయి మంచి ఆరోగ్యానికి అవి సహాయపడుతాయి బియ్యం మరియు చిరుధాన్యాలు మాకు అందుబాటులో దొరుకుతాయి ఆకుకూరలు కూడా ప్రతిరోజు తాజా ఆకుకూరలు దొరుకుతాయి వాటిని మేము ప్రతిరోజు వాడుకుంటాం పాలు మరియు గుడ్లు తీసుకుంటాం దాని వల్ల మంచి ఆరోగ్యం ఉంటుంది

Social media is very important to us. Why it is important to us now is because it can tell us how the future generation will develop. Since IT has developed now, we can see good buildings being developed, like in the US. If we want to develop like the US, our students need to develop well, and for that, they need to study well. Education is crucial for us because without it, we can't do anything in this era.

Now, even to study, people are using social media a lot because online classes are being conducted on social media platforms. Since live classes with teachers are becoming less common, online classes are being used a lot, especially in other countries. 

We use social media for various purposes, like spending time on Instagram, Twitter, and other software. We can watch movies, send messages, and share stories on these platforms. We can also use Whatsapp to chat and make video calls. 

Refrigerators are also very important to us because they help keep our food and drinks cool. We can store vegetables and cool drinks in them, which is essential, especially during hot weather.

Now, if we need to know anything, we can use Google, which is a very helpful software. Without Google, we can't do anything. Whenever we need to know something, we ask Google, and it provides us with the information we need.

Facebook is also a useful platform, just like Instagram. We can use it to chat, send messages, and share stories. We can also use it to make video calls and talk to our friends and family who are far away.

Software is developing rapidly now, and we need to develop our country like the US, China, Australia, and Dubai. To do that, we need to study well and gain knowledge. Technology is advancing, and we have jobs in AI now. Our children will also use the software we are developing, and they will grow up to be successful.

Social media is essential, but we should use it for good purposes. We should not waste our time on unnecessary things. In the past, people didn't have social media and IT, so they couldn't develop their countries as much. But now, India is developing rapidly, and we have access to a lot of information.

Google is also very important to us because it helps us find answers to our questions. Whenever we have a doubt, we can ask Google, and it will provide us with the information we need. We can also use online classes to study, which is very helpful, especially for international students. Many schools are now conducting online classes, which is very useful.

src_sent: If I have to talk about these generations, it could be the old generation or the new generation, but I really can't say which one is better. I also can't say that both are good. This is because, in the old generation, there were many people who saw differences in castes, and even today, there are many people who see such differences in various ways. If you ask me, what I really want to say is that I wish there were no such generations, and all humans were one. The blood that flows through everyone's veins is the same. So, why do we have these different generations, castes, and religions? Why do we see differences in people? Maybe in the old generation, people saw differences, and that's how it has been passed down to the new generation. It's like a disease that has been transmitted. Some people are following it, while others are living without any differences, without any castes or religions, and with unity, considering all humans as equal, giving respect to each other, and living in harmony. If it's like this, then it's good for the country, and it will have a good reputation. If I have to say something, I can say that there's no difference between the old and new generations because what was present in the old generation is still present in the new generation. The differences in castes and religions that were seen in the old generation are still seen in the new generation. Therefore, what I want to say is that, whether it's the old generation or the new generation, we should not see differences in castes or religions. We should consider everyone as equal, and that's what I'm trying to convey.

src_sent: The Telugu language has had a significant impact on our culture and identity. For example, when we have small parties in college, we speak in Telugu very fluently. We converse without any hesitation, and when we do, all the teachers present there applaud and honor whoever is speaking. Similarly, not everyone at the party needs to speak, but if they do so without any hesitation, it shows the impact of the recognition they have for the language.

src_sent:
Andhra Pradesh is home to a diverse range of arts and crafts, including handlooms, handicrafts, and paintings. The state is renowned for its exquisite handloom fabrics, which have been a part of its ancient tradition. Skilled artisans create beautiful and intricate designs on these fabrics, making them truly unique. The state is also famous for its handicrafts, which are an integral part of Indian art and craft. Andhra Pradesh is home to many talented artisans who continue to create these extraordinary handicrafts with great skill.

From needlecraft to bronze, metal, and stone crafts, Andhra Pradesh offers a wide range of handicrafts that can become a part of your lifestyle. The state is also known for its stunning paintings, which are a testament to its rich cultural heritage. These paintings are a reflection of the state's ancient traditions and are created by skilled artists who have honed their craft over the years.

The traditional art of painting in Andhra Pradesh involves the use of natural colors on canvas. The state is also home to various other art forms, including Kuchipudi dance and Carnatic music. All these art forms play a significant role in preserving the cultural heritage and legacy of Andhra Pradesh.

The handlooms of Andhra Pradesh are a symbol of the state's rich cultural heritage. The state is home to many skilled weavers who create beautiful fabrics with intricate designs. These fabrics are highly prized for their beauty and durability. The handlooms of Andhra Pradesh are a testament to the state's rich tradition of textile production.

In addition to its handlooms, Andhra Pradesh is also famous for its handicrafts. The state is home to many skilled artisans who create beautiful handicrafts using a variety of materials, including wood, metal, and stone. These handicrafts are highly prized for their beauty and craftsmanship.

The paintings of Andhra Pradesh are a reflection of the state's rich cultural heritage. The state is home to many skilled artists who create beautiful paintings using a variety of techniques. These paintings are highly prized for their beauty and are a testament to the state's rich tradition of art.

Overall, Andhra Pradesh is a state that is rich in culture and heritage. The state's handlooms, handicrafts, and paintings are a testament to its rich tradition of art and craft. The state's skilled artisans and artists continue to create beautiful works of art that are highly prized for their beauty and craftsmanship.
tgt_sent: ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్ రాష్ట్రంలోని కళలు మరియు చేనేత పనులు హస్తకళలు పెయింటింగ్ [painting] మరియు చేనేత వస్త్రాలు యొక్క విశిష్టమైన శ్రేణిని కలిగి [noise] ఉంటాయి చేనేత వస్త్రాలకు ప్రసిద్ధి చెందిన ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్ చేతిలో చేతితో నేసిన బట్టలు యొక్క పురాతన సంస్థ సున్నితమైన మరియు విలక్షణమైన డిజైన్‌లను కలిగి ఉన్న అత్యంత ప్రత్యేకమైన చీరలు మరియు దుస్తులు డ్రెస్ [dress] మెటీరియల్‌లు ఉత్పత్తి చేస్తుంది అలాగే హస్తకళలు ఎల్లప్పుడూ భారతీయ కళ మరియు చేనేత పనుల యొక్క విశేష విశేషమైన లక్షణము ఆశ్చర్యపరిచే హస్తకళలను అందించే మరో గొప్ప ప్రదేశం ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్ కళాకారులు ఇప్పటికీ ఈ అసాధారణమైన హస్తకళలను నైపుణ్యంతో తయారుచేస్తారు నీడిల్ [needle] క్రాఫ్ట్ [craft] లేదా బ్రాంజ్ [bronze] కా [uhh] స్ట్రింగ్స్ [strings] [uhh] మెటల్ [metal] క్రాఫ్ట్ [craft] లేదా స్టోన్ [stone] క్రాఫ్ట్ [craft] అయిన ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్ మీ జీవన శైలిలో భాగమయ్యే అనేక రకాల హస్తకళలను కలిగి ఉన్నది అలాగే పెయింటింగ్స్ [paintings] ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్ కళలు మరియు చేతి పనులు యొక్క గొప్ప సాంస్కృతిని కలిగి ఉంది ఇది దాని చిత్రాలతో మరింత ఆకర్షణీయంగా కనిపిస్తుంది ఈ మనోహరమైన కళారూప ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్‌లోని పురాతన సాంప్రదాయము ఈ పెయింటింగులు నైపుణ్యం కలిగి కళాకారుల అద్భుతమైన పనితీరును మరియు నైపుణ్యంను కలిగి ఉంది పెయింటింగ్ [painting] యొక్క సాంప్రదాయ కళ కాన్వాస్‌పై సహజ రంగులో ఉపయోగిస్తారు అలాగే వివిధ రకాలైన సాంప్రదాయాలు మరియు కూచిపూడి [uhh] కర్ణాటక సంగీతము వీటన్నిటిని కూడా ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్ యొక్క సాంస్కృతిని మరియు వారసత్వాన్ని కాపాడడంలో ఇవి ఎంతో [uhh] ప్రాముఖ్యమైన పాత్రను పోషిస్తూ ఉంటాయి

src_sent: We need to have talent to succeed in any field, especially in Andhra Pradesh. If we have talent, we will automatically be successful. Another thing is that we should participate in any activity with honesty and complete it. If we want to pursue something, we will face many challenges, whether it's dance, singing, or any other field. It's very difficult to get opportunities, and even if we do, we won't be able to make the most of them if we don't have talent. That's what I think.
tgt_sent: మనం ఏదంటే ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్‍లో ముఖ్యంగా ఎందులో అయినా సరే మనం పాటిస్పేట్ [participate] చేయాలంటే మనకు కావాల్సింది మనకు ఉండాల్సింది మనలో ట్యాలెంట్ [talent] ఉంటే ఆటోమేటిక్‌‍గా మనం సక్సెస్ [success] అవుతాం ఇంకోటి ఏంటంటే మనం నిజాయితీగా ఏదైనా సరే మనం పాల్గొనాలి అలాగే దాని కంప్లీట్ [complete] చేయాలి అలాగే ఏంటంటే మనం మీ ఇప్పుడు మనం దేనికన్నా సరే వెళ్లాలంటే మనం దాంట్లో చాలా అంటే చాలా సవాళ్లు ఎదుర్కొంటాం అది డ్యాన్స్ [dance] అవ్వనివ్వండి లేదా [uhh] పాటలు అవ్వనివ్వండి లేదా ఇంకా వేరే ఎందులో అయినా సరే అవకాశాలు రావాలంటే చాలా కష్టంగా ఉంటుంది అందులో కూడా మనకు అవకాశం రావాలంటే మనకి ప్రతిభ ఉంటే కానీ మనకి ఆ అవకాశం దక్కదు అని నేను అనుకుంటున్నాను

src_sent: We used to have cattle in the old days. As soon as we woke up in the morning, we would put them in a shed. We would clean the entire shed, give them hay to eat, and bathe them. After that, we would take them to the fields. Once we reached the fields, we would let them graze on the green grass, and we would tie them to separate posts so they wouldn't get tangled. We would take care of them and raise them. We would spend the entire day with them, and by evening, we would bring them back home. After returning home, we would again take care of them. In the evening, mosquitoes and other insects would start buzzing around them, so we would create enough smoke to keep them away. We would create smoke using cow dung and other materials, which would prevent the insects from coming near the cattle. After that, we would give them a mixture of fodder and other nutrients to eat, making sure they were well-nourished and strong. That's how we used to take care of our cattle.
tgt_sent: మాకు మాకు పాత కాలంలో పశువులనేవి ఉండేవి అవి వాటిని ప్రొద్దుటే లేవగానే వాటిని వాటిని ఒక పాకలో పెట్టే వాళ్ళం ఆ పాకనంతా శుభ్రం చేసి వాటికి వాటికి గడ్డి రాసి స్నానం చేయించి ఆ తర్వాత వాటిని పొలానికి తీసుకెళ్ళేవాళ్ళం పొలానికి తీసుకెళ్ళాక వాటిని పచ్చగడ్డి తినేలాగా దేనికి దానికి సా విడివిడిగా కా కట్టి [dishes] వాటిని పెంచే వాళ్ళం ఆ తర్వాత మధ్యాహ్నం [dishes] అంతా మేము వాటితోటే ఉండి సాయంత్ర వేళ అయ్యేసరికి మేము వాటిని తీసుకొని ఇంటికి వచ్చి వచ్చిన తర్వాత మళ్ళీ వాటికి [umm] సాయంత్రం అయ్యేసరికి దోమల్లాంటివి వాటి [noise] చుట్టూ చేరడం వల్ల వాటికి తగినంత పొగ పెట్టి తగినంత [horn] పొగ పెట్టిన తర్వాత అవి ఆ పొగ వలన ఏవి వాటి దగ్గరికి వచ్చేవి కాదు క్రిములు కీటకాలు అలాంటివి అలా జరిగిన తర్వాత [hmm] వాటికి తౌడు చిట్టి అవన్నీ కలిపి పెట్టి వాటి పోషకాహారం బలంగా ఉండేలాగా చూసుకొనే వాళ్ళం ఆ విధంగా గడిపే వాళ్ళం

src_sent: Hi, I'm Naga Pavan. I'm ready to answer your question. You asked about traditional games in our area. Okay, in our area, there aren't many traditional games, but we do play cricket, kabaddi, volleyball, and shuttle. We also play a traditional game called "karra billa." I'll explain how to play it. We take a long stick, about the length of our hand, and a smaller stick, about the length of our foot. We place the smaller stick on top of a small hole and hit it with the longer stick. The goal is to catch the smaller stick or hit it in such a way that it lands in the hole. If someone catches the smaller stick, the person who hit it is out. If no one catches it, the person who hit it gets to hit it again. We keep playing until someone is out. We also play cricket. We have two teams with 11 players each, and two umpires. We play with a ball and bat, and the goal is to score runs. We have different types of balls, such as no balls and wide balls. We play for a certain number of overs, usually 8-12 overs. The team with the most runs at the end of the game wins. We also play volleyball. We have two teams with 7 players each, and we play on a court with a net. The goal is to hit the ball over the net and score points. We play for a certain amount of time, and the team with the most points at the end of the game wins. We also play shuttle. We have two players or four players, and we play on a court with a net. The goal is to hit the shuttlecock over the net and score points. We play for a certain amount of time, and the player or team with the most points at the end of the game wins. These are the games we play in our area. We don't have many traditional games, but we enjoy playing these games. Thank you for asking.
tgt_sent: హాయ్ [hi] అండి నేను నాగ పవన్ మాట్లాడుతున్నాను మీరు అడిగిన ప్రశ్నకు జవాబు ఇవ్వడానికి నేను సిద్ధంగా ఉన్నాను మీ ప్రాంతంలో [uhh] సాంప్రదాయ ఆటలు ఏవి అవి ఎలా ఆడతారు అని ఉన్నది సరే అండి మా ప్రాంతంలో సాంప్రదాయ ఆటలు ఈ ఎలాంటివి లేవంటూ పెద్దగా ఏం లేవండి సాంప్రదాయ పరంగా అయితే ఏం లేవు కానీ పరంగా చూసుకుంటే [sneezing] ఇంటి దగ్గర మా లోకల్లో ఎక్కువ ఆడేది క్రికెట్ ఆ తరువాత కబడ్డీ ఆ తరువాత [uhh] వాలీబాల్ [volleyball] ఆ తరువాత [umm] షటిల్ [shuttle] ఇవి ఆడతారండి దాంతోపాటు సాంప్రప​దాయంగా అడిగారు కాబట్టి [uhh] చిన్నప్పటి నుంచి మేము ఆడతాము కర్ర బిళ్ళ అయి ఉంటుంది కదండీ అది ఒక్కటి ఆడతామండి అది ఎలా ఆడతారో చెప్తాను చూడండి అది ఒక కర్ర ఒక పొడుగ్గా మన చేతి పొడుగంత కర్రని తీసుకుంటాము అండి దాంతోపాటు ఒక మన జానెడు అంత ఇంకో చిన్న కర్రని ఇటు ప్రక్క అటు ప్రక్క రెండు ప్రక్కలా చెక్కుకోవాల్సి వస్తుంది అండి ఆ చెక్కుకొని వా ఈ చేతి అంతా ఈ చేతి పొడుగంతా కర్రని కూడా చెక్కుకోవాలి అండి ఈ రెండు కర్రలు కొంచెం లావుగా ఒక మాదిరిగా చిన్న సాలిడ్ [solid] రాడ్‍ [rod] లాగా మనకి పిడికిలి బిగిస్తే ఎంత [cough] సరిపోతుందో అంతవరకు సరిపోతుందో అది ఉంటే [uhh] ఆ సైజు [size] కర్రలు లావు ఉంటే చాలు అండి ఆ తరువాత ఒక త్రీ [three] టూ [two] ఎంఎంస్ [MS] లావు ఉంటే సరిపోతుంది అనుకుంటాను [sneezing] ఆ తరువాత ఒక చిన్న గుంత తో తవ్వుకోవాలి అండి ఆ గుంత పైన ఏదైతే చిన్న జాన జానెడు అంత ఉన్న కర్రని [clanging] ఆ గుంతమీద పెట్టేసి ఆ గుంతలో ఈ చేతి ఈ చేతి పొడుగు అంత ఉన్న కర్రతో పైకి లేపాలి అండి ఇట్లా ఇట్లా పైకి లేపితే దాన్ని ఒక నలుగురు ఐదుగురు లేదా పదిగురు అంత పది మంది అయినా సరే ఆడవచ్చు ఆ ఆటని అందరూ లైన్‍లో నిలుచుంటారు అండి ఎవరైతే ఆ కర్రని కొట్టారో ఆ ఆ చిన్న కర్ర అనేది జానెడు అంత ఉన్న ఆ కర్ర పైకి లేపగానే ఎవరైనా క్యాచ్ src_sent: I really like Robert Kiyosaki as an author. He has written many books, such as "How to Do Business Successfully" and "Rich Dad, Poor Dad." I especially like "Rich Dad, Poor Dad." In this book, he explains how to earn money and how to save it. He uses the example of two families to illustrate this. He also talks about how to make money work for you and how to reduce expenses, save money, and only buy necessary items. If you avoid buying unnecessary things, your wealth will increase. On the other hand, if you spend too much, you'll face difficulties. The book also teaches us how to live our lives, what to do, and what not to do. It's written for two young children, explaining how their parents raised them and how they should or shouldn't be raised. It's a great book. Yes, it's a must-read.

src_sent:
I have a fear of mounting, I mean, climbing hills. It scares me a lot because I'm afraid of looking down from the top. When I look down, I feel dizzy and worry that I might fall. This fear was intense when I first visited Tirupati and climbed the hill. When you climb the Sri Vari steps, you can't look down from the top, and even if you take the Alipiri route, looking down can be frightening. The valley looks scary, and it's a terrifying experience.

However, as I continued to visit Tirupati and climb the hill – I've done it around 5-10 times now – my fear gradually decreased. I've learned to overcome it. Another thing I've learned is to carry food and water with me when I climb. It's essential to stay hydrated, especially since many people get dizzy and fall due to hunger and dehydration. I've seen it happen many times, and I try to help by offering water.

I've also learned that it's better to climb slowly and steadily rather than rushing. If you climb too fast, your legs will ache, but if you take it slow, the pain is more manageable. One of the bravest things I've done is overcoming my fear of climbing hills, especially looking down from the top. It was a significant challenge for me during my first visit, but I've since become more confident.

src_sent:
I love taking photos with a camera, especially capturing natural scenery. When it rains, the sound of the water flowing, the chirping of birds, the cool breeze, and the beautiful sky all make for wonderful photography. I enjoy taking photos of various birds, animals, and trees, as well as their beautiful flowers and the sweet fragrance they emit. When I go to take photos, I feel like I'm capturing the beauty of nature, and it's a dream come true.

I've been interested in photography since I was a child, and I've taken hundreds of thousands of photos. When I look at those photos, I'm reminded of the moment I took them, and it brings back sweet memories. Photos are like memories that stay with us forever, which is why many people, in fact, everyone, likes to capture important moments in their lives through photography. When we look at those photos, it brings us joy and happiness.

Once, I went to Canada and saw a breathtaking scenery that I captured on camera, and it even won an award. I realized that photography is an art that has the power to make people happy. A photographer has the ability to capture moments that can bring joy to others. There are many ways to take photos, and it's an art that requires skill and creativity.

I believe that photography is not just a job, but a passion that brings happiness and peace. When I'm taking photos in a rural setting, I feel a sense of calm and focus. Photography has the power to take us back in time and remind us of happy memories and great people.

I have a special reason for choosing photography as a profession. When I was a child, my teacher showed me a beautiful photo he had taken, and I was inspired by the joy in his eyes. He told me that he had won an award for that photo, and I wanted to experience that same joy. I learned photography with passion and took hundreds of thousands of photos, bringing happiness to many people. Photography is a remarkable art that has gained popularity, and I'm proud to be a part of it.

జ్ఞాపకాలను గొప్ప మనుషులను మనకు మళ్ళీ జ్ఞాపకం చేస్తుంది ఫోటో [photo] ఫొటోగ్రఫీ [photography] ఫొటోస్ [photos] ఎప్పుడూ గొప్పవే నేను మరీ ముఖ్యంగా ఈ ఫొటోసు [photos] తీయడానికి ఒక గొప్ప ఒక రీజన్ [reason] ఉంది ఈ ఫోటోగ్రఫీ [photography] అనే ప్రొఫెషన్ని ఎంచుకోవడానికి ఒక రీజన్ [reason] ఉంది అది ఏమీటంటే చిన్నప్పుడు మా సార్ [sir] ఒక అందమైన ఫొటోని నాకు చూపించి ఇది నేనే తీసాను అని చెప్పారు అప్పుడు చెప్పిన సమయంలో ఆయన కళ్ళల్లో ఏదో సంతోషం నేనే తీసాను దీనికి ఒక అవార్డు [award] వచ్చిందని ఆయన చెప్పినప్పుడు ఆ సంతోషాన్ని నేను కూడా అనుభవించాలి అనుకున్నాను ఎంతో ఇష్టంగా ఫోటోగ్రఫీ [photography] నేర్చుకున్నాను ఎన్నో వందల వేల ఫొటోలు తీసి ఎంతో మంది సంతోషానికి కారణము అయ్యాను ఫోటోగ్రఫీ [photography] అనేది ఒక చెప్పుకోదగ్గ కళగా ఇప్పుడు ప్రాచూర్యం పొందింది

Hello, good morning, sir. We are speaking from a travel agent's office, sir. I'm currently watching your YouTube channel, and I see that you often go on solo trips. What inspired you to travel solo, sir? Do you usually go on long solo journeys or short ones? 

Also, when you're on a long solo journey, how do you feel, sir? Do you ever feel lonely, or does it feel any different? 

Okay, umm, I mean, it's not possible to achieve success without facing any difficulties. I see that you often go on solo bike trips or car trips. Why do you prefer taking a car for long journeys? Is it because it's safer? 

I've been watching your YouTube channel, and I'm one of your followers and viewers. Your videos are inspiring, and that's why I decided to call you. Thank you, sir, thank you for giving your valuable time.
tgt_sent: హలో [hello] హలో [hello] గుడ్ [good] మార్నింగ్ [morning] సార్ [sir] మేము ట్రావెల్ [travel] ఏజెంట్ [agent] ట్రావెల్ [travel] ఆఫీస్ [office] నుంచి మాట్లాడుతున్నాము సార్ [sir] ఇక్కడ ఇప్పుడు మీరు అంటే మీ యూ [you] ట్యూబ్ [tube] ఛానల్ [channel] చూస్తున్నాను నేను సోలో [solo] ట్రిప్స్ [trips] అనేవి ఎక్కువ తిరుగుతూ ఉంటారంటకదా సార్ సోలో [solo] గా జర్నీ [journey] చేయాలని మీకెందుకంపించింది సార్ [sir] అంటే ఇప్పుడు మీరు సోలో [solo] గా లాంగ్ [long] జర్నీస్ [journeys] అలా వెళ్తుంటారా లేకపోతే షార్ట్ [short] జర్నీస్ [journeys] ఆ సార్ [sir] ప్లస్ [plus] మీకు సోలో [solo] గా అట్లా లాంగ్ [long] జర్నీ [journey] వెళ్ళినపుడు మీకు ఎలా అనిపించేది సార్ [sir] అంటే ఏదన్నా ఒంటరిగా ఫీల్ [feel] అవ్వటంగానీ లేకపోతే అలా ఏమన్నా అనిపిస్తుందా సార్ [sir] ఓకే [umm] ఓకే ఓకే [umm] అంటే మీరిప్పుడు ఆ అవునండీ ఇప్పుడు ఏదైనా కష్టం లేకుండా సక్సస్ [success] అవ్వటమనేది అసాధ్యం ఇప్పుడు మీరు బైక్ [bike] మీద ఎక్కువ సోలో [solo] ట్రిప్స్ [trips] కి వెళ్తారండి లేకపోతే కార్ [car] లో వెళ్తారండి అంటే ఇప్పుడు బైక్ [bike] ఇప్పుడు బైక్ [bike] మీద అంటే లాంగ్ [long] జర్నీ [journey] కి తీసుకెళ్లండి కారు [car] కి ఎందుకు ప్రిఫరెన్సు [preference] ఇవ్వరండి మీరు అంటే కార్ [car] ఇప్పుడయితే సేఫ్టీ [safety] ఉంటుంది కదండీ ఏమన్నా మీరు మీ యూ [you] ట్యూబ్ [tube] ఛానల్ [channel] ని చూసి నేను మీ ఫాలోవర్స్ [followers] కానీ వ్యూవర్స్ [viewers] కానీ ఇది చూడటంవల్ల మిమ్మల్ని చూసి ఇన్స్పెయర్ [inspire] అవుదామని చెప్పాయితే నేను కాల్ [call] కాల్ [call] చేసానండీ ఓకే థ్యాంక్ [thank] యూ [you] సార్ [sir] థ్యాంక్ [thank] యూ [you] ఫర్ [for] గివింగ్ [giving] యువర్ [your] వాల్యిబుల్ [valuable] టైమ్ [time]

<stammers> ఆడవాళ్ళు అయితే చీరలు తర్వాత డ్రస్సులు ఇవి మాత్రమే వేసుకోవాలి జీన్స్ [jeans] షాట్సు [shorts] అండ్ [and] తర్వాతనేమో చిన్న చిన్న బట్టలు అలాంటివి వేసుకోవద్దనమాట అబ్బాయిలైతే ఎట్లుండాలంటే అబ్బాయిలే ఇంక ఓన్లీ [only] పంచలు అలాంటివి మాత్రం వేసుకోవాలి కానీ ఇప్పుడున్న ప్రస్తుతం ఏంటంటే కొంచెం పరిమాణం చెందిందనమాట ఎలా చెందిందంటే ఇప్పుడు వాళ్ళు ఏం చేస్తున్నారంటే చుట్టూ మన కల్చర్‍నే పాటించడం ఎందుకు పక్కనోళ్ళ కల్చర్‍ని పాటిస్తే బాగుంటుంది కదా అనేసి ఇలా తెలంగాణలోని <unintelligible> విధానాలనేవి మార్చారనమాట బట్టలు జీన్స్ [jeans] వేసుకోవడం అమ్మాయిలు అబ్బాయిలు కూడా జీన్స్ [jeans] వేసుకొని [technology] డెవలప్ [develop] అయింది కాబట్టి మన ఓలా [ola] ఊబరు [uber] అందులోనే బుక్ [book] చేసుకుంటున్నాము తరువాత ట్యాక్సీలు <uhh> గవర్నమెంట్ [government] బస్సులు గవర్నమెంట్ [government] బస్సులల్లో అయితే ఇంకా ఇప్పుడైతే ఇంకా అమ్మాయిలకు ఫ్రీనే కాబట్టి తెలంగాణలో ఇంకా వాళ్ళకయితే చాలా ఇక ఎక్కడికి వెళ్ళకుండా గవర్నమెంట్ [government] బస్సులోనే ఎక్కువగా వెళ్తున్నారన్నమాట బైకులు అయిపోయినాయి ఒకప్పుడు ఎక్కడికి వెళ్ళాలన్న గానీ రైల్వే [railway] స్టేషన్‍కి కానీ బస్సుల గానీ ఎక్కడికి వెళ్ళాలన్నా కానీ ఆటో [auto] రిక్షాలు బస్సులు ఇలాంటివి కట్టుకొని రైల్వే [railway] స్టేషన్‍కి వెళ్ళేది అట్లా వెళ్ళేది ఇక పొలానికి వెళ్ళాలంటే ఎడ్లబండి కట్టుకొని వెళ్ళేదన్నమాట కానీ ఇప్పుడు ఏంటంటే పొలానికి వెళ్ళాలన్న గానీ బైకులు తీసుకొని వెళ్తున్నాము మనము ఒకప్పుడు అట్లా ఉండే కానీ ఇప్పుడు చాలావరకు మారిపోయిందనమాట ప్రస్తుతం ఎడ్ల <unintelligible> మనకు అవసరం ఉంటుంది కదా ఊర్లల్లో అయితే ఏం చేస్తమంటే ఇంకా పొలాలు దున్నడానికి ఇలాంటి వాటికి పనికొస్తాయి వాళ్ళు దున్నడానికి <umm> ఇలాంటి వాటికి పనికొస్తాయి కాబట్టి ఉంచుకున్నారు అదే లేకుంటే అవి లేకుంటే అవి కూడా ఉండకపోతుండే ఏమైనా ఉన్నా గానీ ఒకప్పుడు బియ్యపు బస్తాలు గానీ తర్వాతనేమో మందు కట్టలు గానీ మోయడానికి ఎడ్ల బండినే ఉపయోగించేవారు కానీ ఇప్పుడు అసలు ఎడ్ల బండినే లేదు ఎక్కువగా ఎక్కడ లేవు ఎక్కువగా కనిపిస్తలేవు కూడా ఆటో [auto] రిక్షాలో ఉండే అప్పుడు ఇప్పుడు ఆటోలు అనేసి వచ్చినాయంటే నార్మల్‍గా టెక్నాలజీ [technology] డెవలప్ [develop] అయింది కాబట్టి ఆటోలన్నీ చేంజ్ [change] చేసారు src_sent: We get 24 hours of electricity, but with power cuts, it's different in various seasons. Our lives are affected, especially during summer. Currently, the government provides us with 24/7 electricity. Since it's summer, many people are struggling. If there's no electricity for even an hour, people get restless because of the heat. We almost get 23 hours of electricity, but since Revanth Reddy took over, there have been power cuts. In other seasons, like winter, electricity isn't as crucial. Now, in summer, many people face difficulties without ACs, fans, or coolers. In offices and colleges, projectors are used, and electricity is necessary. Without 24 hours of electricity, no work can be done. Traffic signals and other activities require electricity. So, electricity is essential for me, and it should be available 24/7. The government is also investing a lot in electricity. The previous chief minister provided 24/7 electricity, and now Revanth Reddy has introduced 200 units of free electricity, which is helpful, especially for those in the city who use ACs, washing machines, and other appliances. The free electricity scheme is beneficial for the poor.

tgt_sent: హలో [hello] ట్యాక్సీ [taxi] డ్రైవరేనా అండి అండి నేను ఇప్పుడు దగ్గర దగ్గర ఒక ఫైవ్ [five] మినిట్స్ [minutes] నుంచి నేను వెయిట్ [wait] చేస్తూనే ఉన్నాను కొంచెం మీరు ఎక్కడున్నారో చెప్తే నాకు ఒక క్లారిటీ [clarity] వస్తుంది కదా మీరు త్వర ఎంత త్వరగా వస్తారో అనే విషయంలో అవునా అండి ఇప్పుడు కొంచెం ఎంత ఎంత దూరంలో వస్తారండి [uhh] సరే అండి కొంచెం త్వరగా వచ్చేటట్టు చూడరా ఎందుకంటే నేను ఎప్పటినుంచో వెయిట్ [wait] చేస్తున్నా నీ బస్ [bus] స్టాప్‌లో బస్టాండ్‌లో ఎవరు లేరండి అమ్మాయిలు ప్లీజ్ [please] అండి కొంచం త్వరగా రండి నాకు అనీజీగా ఉంటుంది కదా నేను కొంచెం ఇంటికెళ్ళి ఫ్రెష్ [fresh] అప్ [up] అయ్యి నేను బయటికెళ్ళే పనుంది కొంచెం త్వరగా రారా ఎప్పుడొస్తుందో పొని అట్లీస్ట్ [atleast] చెప్పండి ఓకే [OK] ఇంకో ఫైవ్ [five] మినిట్స్‌లో వచ్చేస్తారు కదా [uhh] ఓకే అండి థ్యాంక్ [thyank] యూ [you] త్వరగా రారా కొంచెం [uhh] ఓకే [OK]అండి థ్యాంక్ [thyank] యూ [you]

src_sent:
I'm very fond of participating in the Swachh Bharat Mission. Recently, all of us in the village, including the Sachivalayam staff and volunteers, came together to participate in the mission voluntarily. We cleaned the roads, cleared the drainage, and made sure the surrounding areas were clean. We also ensured that there was no litter and cleaned up the trash. We put the trash in the garbage truck and took it away. It was a great experience.

New drainage systems are being built in our village, which will help keep the village clean. The village will be free of stagnant water, and the environment will be clean and hygienic. That's why we all came together to participate in the Swachh Bharat Mission. We cleaned up our respective areas, and everyone, including children and adults, worked together to keep our village clean. We do this once a month, and we all work together to keep our village clean and hygienic.

If the roads and surrounding areas are clean, the environment will be healthy and pleasant. This will prevent the spread of diseases, and we all believe that it's essential to keep our village clean.
tgt_sent: స్వచ్ఛభారత్ మిషన్‍లో పాల్గొనడం చాలా ఇష్టం నాకు ఇటీవల కాలంలోనే అందరం ఊళ్ళో సచివాలయం స్టాఫ్ [staff] వాలంటీర్స్ [volunteers] అందరు కలిసి స్వచ్ఛందంగా స్వచ్చభారత్ మిషన్‍లో పాల్గొన్నాము ఆ విషయంలో అందరం కలిసి సచివాలయం ఏరియాలో పంచాయతీ ఆఫీస్ [office] ఏరియాలో [uhh] ఆ రోడ్లు తుడవ ఊడవడం డ్రైనేజీ బాగు చేయడం అదే వీళ్ళ పరిసర ప్రాంతాల్లో నీట్‌గా చేసుకోవడం చెత్త లేకుండా [uhh] అందరం కలిసి చెత్తను ఊడ్చేయడం చెత్త బండిలో వేసుకు తీసుకెళ్ళడం చాలా బాగుంది అలాగే మా ఊళ్ళో ఉన్న క్రొత్తగా డ్రైనేజీలు కడుతున్నారు దానివల్ల ఏంటంటే ఊరు అంతా చాలా పరిశుభ్రంగా ఉంటుంది మురుగు ఎక్కడ పడితే అక్కడ నిలబడకుండా చాలా నీట్‌గా ఉండడానికి అవకాశం ఉంది దానికోసమే అందరం కలిసికట్టుగా స్వచ్ఛభారత్‍లో పాల్గొని పిల్లలు పెద్దోళ్ళు అందరం ఎవరి ఏరియాలో వాళ్ళే మొత్తం శుభ్రం చేసుకుంటాము ఇది నెలకు ఒకసారి‍గా అందరం కలిసికట్టుగా చేసుకుని మా గ్రామాన్ని మేమే పరిశుభ్రంగా ఉంచుకోవడానికి అందరం కలిసికట్టుగా పనిచేస్తాము రోడ్లు ప్రాంతాలు శుభ్రంగా ఉంటే ఆరోగ్యంగా ఆహ్లాదకరంగా వాతావరణం ఉంటుంది కాబట్టి దానివల్ల రోగాలు అవి రాకుండా ఉంటాయని అందరం భావిస్తున్నాము

src_sent: Hello, Suresh sir. My friend Jagadish told me that you organize events, so I've called you. We're planning my sister's wedding at the end of this month, and I wanted to know how to make the event memorable. Could you please share some ideas on how to make it special? We're considering having it at home or a mandapam, depending on the number of guests. We have a large family, and many people will be attending. We'd like to know if you can handle everything, including the mehendi function, music, catering, and decorations. We'd also like to have balloons and flower decorations. We're looking for a mix of vegetarian and non-vegetarian options, as some of our guests prefer veg. We're thinking of having the event in the last week of this month or the first or second week of next month. We'll finalize the date based on the muhurtham. If you could help us plan a memorable event, that would be great. Let's discuss further. My number is 9025 333 8080. Please save it, and we'll talk again. Please let me know what you think would work best, and we'll decide accordingly. Thank you, and I'll wait to hear from you. Bye.

src_sent: The climate in Vizianagaram district is very hot, and the people living there are affected in their daily lives, especially during the summer season. Some people stay indoors, while others go to work in shops, and a few go on pilgrimages. Due to the extreme heat, people tend to have a darker complexion. The locals usually avoid going out during the summer season. However, from July to September, there is heavy rainfall, and the climate is generally hot and humid. The people prefer to go on pilgrimages during the winter season, as the weather becomes cooler during that time, making it ideal for traveling.
tgt_sent: విజయనగరం జిల్లాలో వాతావరణం ఎలా ఉంటుందంటే విజయనగరంలో చాలా వేడి ఎక్కువగా ఉంటుంది అక్కడ నివసించిన ప్రజలు రోజువారీ జీవితంలో కాలాలల్లో ఎలా ప్రభావితం చేస్తారు అంటే కొంతమంది అందరూ కలిపి కొంతమంది ఇంటిలో ఉంటారు కొంతమంది షాపు [shop]ల్లో పనిచేసుకోవడానికి వెళ్తారు ఇంకొంతమంది బయట తీర్థ యాత్రలకు ఎక్కువగా వెళ్తారు అక్కడ వాతావరణం చాలా వేడిగా ఉంటుంది ఆ వేడి వల్ల మనుషులు అందరూ కొంచం నల్లగా ఉంటారు అక్కడున్న ప్రజలు ఎండాకాలంలో అసలు బయటికి వెళ్లరు జులై నుండి సెప్టెంబర్ వరకు గరిష్ట వర్షపాతం ఎక్కువగా ఉంటుంది సాధారణంగా వేడి మరియు తేమతో కూడిన వాతావరణం ఉంటుంది అక్కడ ఎక్కువగా వాళ్ళు తీర్థయాత్రలు చేయడానికి శీతాకాలంలో ఇష్టపడతారు ఎందుకు అంటే ఆ టైము [time]లో విజయనగరం అంతా కొంచెం చల్లగా మారుతుంది

Okay, what else do you need? Do you need any bathroom cleaning products like Harpic or Domex? Do you need any milk or curd? Are you sure you didn't forget anything? These are monthly groceries, right? Do you need any other items like acid or phenyl? What about Comfort fabric softener? Okay, do you need any tea powder? We have Boost tea powder if you want it. East Godavari district has undergone numerous changes over time, particularly in terms of economy and infrastructure. Several factors have contributed to these changes, including the introduction of new methods of income generation. While agriculture still plays a significant role in the district's economy, farmers have now started cultivating new crops such as cotton, coconut, and aquaculture. These changes have helped increase farmers' incomes. Advances in water resource management and the establishment of educational and healthcare institutions have also improved the district's irrigation systems and access to education and healthcare. This has contributed to reducing poverty and improving living standards in the district.

The agricultural sector, particularly aquaculture, has become a significant contributor to the district's economy. The increased fish production in the district is higher than the national average. These changes have had a significant impact on the lives of the people living in the district, with increased incomes and improved living standards. There is also greater access to education and healthcare.

Some specific examples of these changes include increased incomes for farmers, who have started earning more by adopting new crops and farming methods. This has improved their overall well-being and living standards. People in the district now have better access to education and healthcare, which has contributed to an overall improvement in the quality of life.

East Godavari district is still developing, but it has already undergone many significant changes.

src_sent:
I ordered different types of hair oils from Flipkart, but my hair fall didn't reduce. In fact, it increased. I kept trying different products from various companies, thinking that maybe this one or that one would work better. I'd see advertisements on TV and order the product immediately, hoping it would help my hair grow. But nothing seemed to work. I was disappointed and frustrated.

Then, I started thinking about it, and I realized that maybe I should try a more natural approach. I decided to make my own hair oil using coconut oil and some herbs that are easily available, like hibiscus flowers, fenugreek seeds, and amla. I mixed all these ingredients together, heated them up, and strained the mixture to create my own natural hair oil.

I started using this oil, and within a week or 10 days, I noticed a significant improvement. My hair fall reduced, and my hair started looking healthier and more natural. I was thrilled! I started using it regularly and even applied it to my children's hair. They also showed significant improvement in their hair growth.

My family members were impressed with the results, and they started using the oil too. We all noticed a significant reduction in hair fall and an improvement in hair growth. I realized that instead of relying on commercial products, it's better to use natural ingredients that are easily available to us.

I think it's better to make our own hair oil using natural ingredients rather than buying commercial products that may not work as well. By doing so, we can avoid unnecessary chemicals and promote healthy hair growth. I'm happy to say that my entire family is now using this natural hair oil, and we're all enjoying the benefits of healthy, beautiful hair.

I would advise everyone to try making their own natural hair oil instead of relying on commercial products. It's easy, effective, and much better for your hair in the long run. Don't waste your money on products that may not work; instead, try this natural approach and see the difference for yourself.

src_sent: I have siblings, and we are five sisters. I am the youngest. My four elder sisters took good care of me, and they used to pamper me a lot, saying I was the youngest. My parents also used to pamper me, saying I was the youngest, and they took good care of me. They used to bring me everything I needed. However, I faced some difficulties. I never got new clothes, a new school bag, or a new bicycle. I had to use my sister's old bicycle, and I had to study from the same books she used in her previous class. Even the uniform I wore was the one my sister had discarded. When my sister went to a higher class, and the uniform became small for her, I had to wear it, and they would say, "You are small, so it will fit you." This used to make me very sad. Whenever I asked for new things, they would say, "Your sisters are there, use their old things." This continued even when I was in middle school. Even the marriage proposal that came for me was the same one that my sister had rejected. When the proposal came for my sister, she rejected it, but when it came for me, they said it was okay. I used to get frustrated with my sister many times, saying that I always got her old things. However, my parents loved me a lot, and my mother had a special affection for me. My father also loved me more than my sisters. They used to bring me all my favorite food and encourage me to study. They supported me in everything I did. My sisters also loved me and took care of me. My eldest sister used to cook for me and take care of me like a mother. She even used to wash my clothes and style my hair. Many people say that sisters have more love for each other than brothers, and I think it's true. My sisters encouraged and supported me in everything I did.

src_sent:
My name is C. I studied up to 10th class. I studied from 1st to 3rd class in Karimnagar. Later, I studied at Puttur Gopal Krishna Puram hostel. After completing my 10th class, I returned home and then did ITI for two years. I chose the dress-making trade in ITI. While studying dress-making, I fell in love with a boy named Dhanashekhar, who is my aunt's son. We got married after he accepted my proposal. We have two children now. Our first child was a boy, and the second child was also a boy, but unfortunately, he passed away. We had another boy later.

Before marriage, I visited Tirupati. When I returned from Tirupati, my mother-in-law used to cook and serve me food. I didn't know how to cook Pongal, a traditional dish, until I visited my sister's house during the Pongal festival. They taught me how to make Pongal, and I learned it. Now, I plan to make Pongal in the same way and teach others too.

Time is very precious. In the past, I used to think that there was plenty of time, but now I realize that time is limited. We should not waste time and use it wisely. Time waits for no one, and we should make the most of it. I think about this a lot now. We often say that we don't have time, but we should prioritize our time and use it efficiently. If we don't have time, we can't do anything. So, we should take care of our children, educate them, and keep them healthy. Health is wealth, and if we are healthy, everything will be fine. I hope everyone will be healthy and happy.

Now, I think about the importance of time and health. We should all strive to be healthy and happy without any evil intentions. I wish everyone will be good and healthy.

src_sent: I work as a teacher for my livelihood, which means I work as an educator. Why do I work as an educator? It's because that's my desire. Since childhood, I've wanted to be a teacher, to teach someone, to educate everyone. Everyone should learn, and education should reach everyone. With that education, everyone will strengthen their intelligence and abilities. That's what I used to say, and I still do. I'm still working as a teacher. I've struggled a lot to reach this position. Why did I choose this profession? It's because I love talking to children, teaching them, and educating them. I enjoy doing all these things. It was my desire, and no matter how difficult it was, my desire has been fulfilled. I know that if we work hard, our desires will be fulfilled. That's why I fulfilled my desire. I wanted to be a teacher, and I love being one.

src_sent:
The health benefits provided by the government are numerous. We get to know about these through advertisements on YouTube and TV. By watching these ads, we gain some knowledge about the available benefits. For instance, if someone has a heart condition, liver issue, or is pregnant, we can find out which government hospitals or private hospitals provide treatment for these conditions. We also learn about the specific hospitals that have been selected to provide these services. 

To utilize these services, we need to know if we are eligible for the health scheme. We can verify this by using our Aadhaar card. The government has announced that those with an income below one lakh, as indicated on their ration card, are eligible for this scheme. We can confirm our eligibility and then visit the designated hospital to receive treatment. 

By availing of these services, we benefit greatly. We don't have to spend a lot of money because the government covers the costs. We only need to pay for medicines, but there are no hospital fees or doctor's fees. The government takes care of all these expenses. Using such services brings us immense joy.

src_sent:
In the Mancherial district, what are the main problems faced by the elderly regarding health care, social, and self-respect? What are the opportunities? Old age, retirement, conflict, diabetes, senior citizens, the same, uh, Aasara pension scheme, so I won't talk about this in detail, but I'll mention a few things. Aasara pension is essential for every elderly person, so it's their only support. What I'm saying is that the government should take care of everyone and provide pensions on time. They don't have anyone, so they rely on the government pension to survive. Due to their age, they can't work outside, so if they don't receive their pension on time, it's very difficult for them to live.

I'm saying that the government should provide pensions on time. There are different types of pensions, too. Suppose we take the senior citizen pension from this age. We need to deposit a certain amount every month. So, you deposit the amount, and after you turn 60 or 65, you can withdraw it, meaning you'll receive the amount from the government. There's no tax on this, and you can receive it monthly or annually. So, you can apply for the senior citizen scheme.

Another benefit is that you'll receive interest along with your principal amount from the bank. So, there won't be any problem with the implementation. Even if there's an issue, it will be adjusted. So, what I'm saying is that the senior citizen scheme is available online, and you can apply for it.

In the Mancherial district, the government has worked hard to improve health care and social media, so they should continue to do so to resolve many issues. The people there will be fine.

Why does diabetes occur? It's because of sugar. So, what we should do is reduce our white sugar intake after the age of 30. If we do, we won't get any diseases, even in old age. I wanted to mention this.

Along with that, I previously mentioned the senior citizens' welfare fund. If you take the senior citizens' scheme, it's very good for you. Everyone should apply for the Aasara pension scheme, and you'll definitely receive it from the government. That's all I wanted to say. Thank you.

src_sent:
I've read about many kings in India since my childhood, but the one who fascinated me the most is Shivaji, also known as Chhatrapati Shivaji. In India, he is revered as a great god. He established the Maratha Empire, and his wars were so fierce that other kings would tremble with fear. He received his training from his parents and teachers, which helped him become a great warrior. What inspires me is that he achieved so much at a young age, killing many enemies and protecting his kingdom from invaders. He is an ideal person who took care of his people, and we consider him a great individual.

I've also heard about other great kings like Chandragupta Maurya, Samudragupta, Harshavardhana, and Krishnadevaraya. Samudragupta, the second king of the Gupta dynasty, conquered the entire Indian subcontinent. He was a brave warrior who expanded his empire, and his training made him invincible. Even the great king Chandragupta Maurya was impressed by his courage and declared him his successor. Samudragupta conquered the entire northern India, and his empire was vast.

Krishnadevaraya, the king of Vijayanagara, was another great ruler who impressed me. He was a Telugu king who ruled with great wisdom and bravery. He was praised by even the great Mughal emperor Akbar and the traveler Barbosa. Krishnadevaraya's achievements and courage are still an inspiration to us today.

Harshavardhana was another great king who ruled northern India for 41 years. He was a powerful and wise ruler who expanded his empire. Although I don't know much about Chandragupta Maurya, I do know that he united the small kingdoms and established a vast empire. He received training from great teachers like Chanakya, which helped him become a great king. However, he faced many challenges, including the insult to his mother, which motivated him to establish his own kingdom.

It's a blessing to have had such great kings in our country. They have protected us from injustices and crimes, and we are proud to have had them as our rulers.

We enjoy swimming, and we love going to the sea to swim. There are canals nearby, and we also like swimming in them. Usually, we go to the swimming pool in our town, and all the kids enjoy swimming there. Most of the kids know how to swim, and they have a great time. They also love playing cricket, and every Saturday and Sunday, our kids go to the pool or play cricket. Since they're a bit older now, they're trying to reduce their weight by swimming one day and playing cricket the next.

As for trekking, we haven't gone on any big trips, but we'd love to. We haven't had the chance yet, but the kids are eager to go. They love playing cricket, not just playing but also watching. We have a mango farm. In May, before the mango season starts, we need to remove all the buds from the trees. We also need to spray pesticides every three months to prevent insects and pests. From February, the trees start blooming, and that's when bees and butterflies start coming. To prevent them from getting harmed, we avoid spraying pesticides during that time. We also dig trenches around the trees and water them regularly. To protect the farm from wild animals like cows and wild boars, we put up fencing around the farm. We have a well, and we use a motor to pump water to the trees. After the flowers have bloomed, we need to take good care of them until the mangoes are ready to be picked. We also have other plants like roses and sampangi in the farm, which we take care of regularly. We remove weeds and water them every week. We also spray pesticides to prevent insects. Every day, we go to the farm to pick flowers, and we need to be careful not to damage the plants. We also need to remove any dry leaves or branches. After the flowers have been picked, we use a mixture of cow dung and chemical fertilizers to help the plants grow. We also remove any dry leaves, which helps new leaves to grow, and eventually, new flowers to bloom.

src_sent: The BBC network, which has spread across the globe, provides unbiased news and in-depth information on social, economic, and various other sectors. This is all because of the media. Through the media, we can understand what's happening in different parts of the world, and we're becoming more cautious. We're also learning how to keep ourselves updated and how to keep our children informed. So, the media is providing us with a lot of information, not just about news, but also about culture, games, sports, movies, and cultural programs. We're getting updates on everything, from A to Z, no matter where it's happening in the world. This is helping us become more aware and informed. This is all because of the media's influence. The media's influence is providing us with a lot of awareness and information.

In North India, the language is Hindi, and everyone speaks Hindi there. However, in South India, people speak different languages like Telugu, Tamil, and so on. Similarly, the clothing is also different. The clothes people wear are quite distinct. The climate is also different. The climate is also different. North India is colder, whereas South India is not that cold. It snows heavily in North India, but not as much in South India. Additionally, politics play a significant role in North India, whereas in South India, it's not that prominent. Although it exists, it's not as visible.

Literacy rates are higher in North India, with more people educated, but in South India, the literacy rate is lower. Geographical opportunities are also different. The way people dress, their language, and everything else is distinct. However, we are united. There is unity among Indians, especially in South India, where there is a sense of unity among the people.

src_sent:
People generally use public transportation, which is very convenient and reliable. The Telangana State Road Transport Corporation (TSRTC) bus is a common mode of transportation for students and the general public. As students, we use the bus to commute to college, and we have a bus pass that we renew every month. This is very helpful for us, and the Telangana government is doing a great job in providing this service.

Additionally, the government has introduced a free bus scheme for women, where they can travel for free by showing their Aadhaar card. This is a great initiative, and many women are benefiting from it.

For tourists, there are many reliable transportation options available, including Uber and Ola. These services are very convenient, and the drivers are trustworthy. They will take you to your destination without any hassle, and you can track your journey using the app.

There are also many options available for tourists, including taxis, autos, and bikes. You can book these services using the app, and they will take you to your destination.

The railways are also a convenient mode of transportation, and they are very affordable. You can travel to different parts of the country using the railways, and they are very reliable.

Recently, the bullet train has been introduced, which is a high-speed train that can take you to your destination quickly. This is a great initiative, and it will revolutionize the way we travel.

The metro is also a convenient mode of transportation, especially in cities. It is very affordable and reliable, and you can travel quickly using the metro. The metro is also very safe, and there are security personnel present at all stations.

There are also many cab services available, including Ola and Uber. These services are very convenient, and you can book a cab using the app. The drivers are trustworthy, and they will take you to your destination without any hassle.

Overall, there are many reliable transportation options available in Telangana, and the government is doing a great job in providing these services. The transportation system is very convenient, reliable, and safe, making it easy for people to travel around the state.

src_sent: I'm saying that the Telugu language is facing many challenges in the modern world because now Telugu has become inferior. How did it become like this? Now, everyone is putting their children in English convent schools, and if they speak Telugu, they are looked down upon. What I mean is that now speaking Telugu is like committing a crime. In those English convent schools, big schools, and colleges, what's happening is that they are looking down on Telugu. If someone speaks Telugu, they are not given respect. Even teachers and lecturers scold them, saying, "Why are you speaking in Telugu? What's wrong with you? Is that why your parents are paying so much money, for you to speak in Telugu?" They say, "You should speak in English, only then will we know your talent, only then will we know your capabilities." They insult and humiliate those who speak Telugu. It's very painful. Sometimes I feel like, "Why is it like this? Why is it like this?" But in this modern era, Telugu has become inferior. Everywhere you look, there are fewer people writing books in Telugu, fewer people reading Telugu poetry, and fewer Telugu songs. In a way, even the number of Telugu names has decreased. Everywhere you look, there are English names, English books, and English songs. Even in movies, it's all English. I feel like the Telugu language is dying, it's becoming extinct. But still, in some villages, the Telugu language is alive. Not just in villages, but also in cities, there are some people who speak Telugu, who are willing to give their lives for Telugu. They are the ones who will keep Telugu alive. In this modern era, Telugu has become very inferior. How inferior? If someone speaks Telugu, they are looked down upon. I'm telling you, even I was humiliated in school for speaking Telugu. Many people like me have faced humiliation for speaking Telugu. In this modern world, some people have even committed suicide because of the humiliation they faced for speaking Telugu. Humiliation is very painful, it hurts the heart. If someone is humiliated, they can't take it. That's how the Telugu language has become in this era, like a small, inferior language. It's very painful. The Telugu language, which once taught the world about education, which was praised by great poets as "Desa bhashalandu Telugu lessa," has now become a laughing stock. It's very sad.

మర్యాద ఉండదు మాట్లాడుతున్నకూడా టీచర్‍లు సార్‍లు తిడుతూ ఉంటారు తెలుగులో మాట్లాడుతున్నావు ఏంది నువ్వు ఆ మీవాళ్ళు అందుకే పైసలుకట్టి పంపిస్తుండ్రా ఇంగ్లీషులో మాట్లాడాలని చెప్పి ఇప్పుడు అంత ఎందుకండి అడుగడుగునా నాకు తెలుగుభాష అనేది సవాళ్లనే ఎదుర్కొంటుందని చెప్పాల ఒకసారి ఏమనిపిస్తుందంటే తెలుగుభాష అనేది అంతరించిపోతుందేమో అనిపిస్తుంది కానీ ఏమాటకామాట అండి తెలుగుభాష అనేది ప్రపంచం మొత్తంల ప్రపంచం మొత్తంలో ఉన్న భాషలల్లో అత్యంత సులభకరమైన భాష తెలుగుభాషలో భాష ఎంత సులువైనదంటే ఇప్పుడు ఏ భాష నేర్చుకోవడానికి అయినాసరే మనిషికి కష్టమవుతుంది అండి తెలుగుభాష ఈజీగా అర్థం చేసుకోగలుగుతాడు ఈజీగా తెలుసుకోవాలి ఇంగ్లీషు ఇంగ్లీషు ఇంగ్లీషు ఇంగ్లీషు ఇంగ్లీషు ఇంగ్లీషు ఈ తెలుగు మాట్లాడితేచాలు ఏదోనేరం చేసినట్టు ఏదో మరీగోరంగా నేరంచేసినట్టు మరీచులకనగా చూస్తుండ్రు మరీ హీనంగా తెలుగు మాట్లాడినవాడు అసలు మనిషే src_sent:
I went to a clothing store about ten days ago to buy some bed sheets. As soon as I got there, they showed me a wide variety of bed sheets, but I really liked four of them because of their quality and color. So, I asked for their prices, and they told me different prices for each one. I bought the ones I liked at a price that I was comfortable with.

As soon as I brought them home and put them on my bed, the whole room looked beautiful. The bed sheets added a nice touch to the bed and the room. My neighbors from next door and across the street came over, saw the bed sheets, and asked me where I bought them because they really liked them. I told them the name of the store, and they said they would buy some too. Thank you.

src_sent:
Andhra Pradesh is an amazing state, with numerous attractions ranging from historical sites to natural wonders. Some of my favorite places to visit in Andhra Pradesh are Araku Valley, a beautiful hill station located in the Eastern Ghats, where you can enjoy breathtaking views of hills, forests, and waterfalls. Another is the famous ancient Hindu temple, Sri Kalahasti, dedicated to Lord Shiva, renowned for its sculpture and architecture. 

Additionally, the Borra Caves in Visakhapatnam are one of the largest caves in India, formed over two million years ago, featuring stunning stalactites and stalagmites. The Kodanda Rama Temple is an ancient Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Rama, also famous for its sculpture and architecture. 

Ushni Beach is a beautiful beach located in the East Godavari district, where you can enjoy the sun, sea, and local cuisine. I would love to visit these places because they possess incredible beauty and history, which would help me understand India's culture and heritage.

We went to the food court the other day. Normally, we go to the food court near Besant Road, but this time we decided to try a different one. We also had ice cream, which was really good. After that, we went to a cafe, where I ordered French fries, pasta, and other items. The food was excellent, and I enjoyed it immensely.

In the evening, we went to a different location, where we had a large plate of food. We were all asked to eat from the same plate, which was a unique experience. The food was delicious, and we enjoyed it a lot. We had so much food that day that we were all shocked. But it was all worth it, as the food was excellent.

I have to say that the best part of the day was the cool cake and black forest cake that I had. It was so good that I wanted to eat more, but my stomach was already full. So, I had to stop myself from eating too much. Overall, it was a fantastic day, and I enjoyed every moment of it.

I was happy to see that there were many food items that I liked, including biryani and ice cream. The food court was an excellent place to spend the day, and I was glad that I got to enjoy it with my friends and family. It was a memorable day, and I will always cherish the memories of it. As someone who loves food, especially fast food, I was in heaven that day. I enjoyed every bite of the food, and I was extremely happy.

src_sent: Going to the hospital and getting an OP (outpatient) consultation is a very difficult task. Even if we go early in the morning, there are so many people. The lines are very long, and it's not just the lines; the entire area is crowded. Standing in those lines is very challenging, especially for the elderly and children. They get very tired and hungry, and it's hard for them to stand for so long. Many people are struggling with health issues, and it's not easy for them to stand in line. We request the government to take necessary actions to address this issue. Not everyone can afford to go to a private hospital, as it's very expensive. That's why people come to government hospitals, but the crowds here are overwhelming. Seeing the crowds, some people might think twice about coming to the hospital, as standing in line is a huge task. Even after standing in line, there's no guarantee that we'll get to see a doctor, as they might not be available at that time. We have to stand in line till evening, which is very tiring.
tgt_sent: హాస్పిటల్‍కి వెళ్ళి ఓపీ [OP] తీసుకుందాము అంటే ఎంత కష్టంగా ఉంది అంటే పొద్దున్నె వెళ్ళినా కూడా ఎంత జనము ఉంటున్నారు అంటే [inhaling] లైన్‍లో చాలా అంటే చాలా జనము ఉంటున్నారు వాళ్ళు పెట్టే లైన్ [line] కన్నా చాలా అంటే నిండిపోయి ఉంటున్నారు ఆ లైన్‍లో నిలుచోవడం చాలా ఇబ్బందిగా ఉంటుంది ప్రతి ఒక్కరికి పిల్లలే ముసలి వాళ్ళు అయితే ఇంకా చెప్పక్కర్లేదు వాళ్ళు అంతల నలుగు వాళ్ళు ఎంతలా నలిగిపోతున్నారు అంటే పిల్లలంటే చాలా అంటే చాలా ఏడుస్తున్నారు వాళ్ళు అక్కడ తినలేక వాళ్ళు అక్కడ నిలుచోలేక చాలా ఇబ్బంది పడుతున్నారు ఆరోగ్యం బాగాలేని వాళ్ళు ప్రతి ఒక్కరు ఆ లైన్‍లో నిలుచోని ఉండడం అంటే చాలా అంటే చాలా కష్టం దానివల్ల గవర్నమెంట్ [government] చాలా చర్యలు తీసుకోవాలని కోరుకుంటున్నాం అది అలాగని చెప్పి ప్రతి ఒక్కరు గో ప్రైవేట్ [private] హాస్పిటల్‍కి వెళ్ళలేరు ప్రైవేట్ [private] హాస్పిటల్‍కి వెళ్తే ఎక్కడ ఎక్కువ డబ్బులు అయిపోతాయని చెప్పి గవర్నమెంట్ [government] హాస్పిటల్‍కి వస్తారు గవర్నమెంట్ [government] హాస్పిటల్‍కి వస్తే ఎంత జనము ఉంటున్నారు అంటే ఆ జనముని చూసి వాళ్ళు హాస్పిటల్‍కి వెళ్ళకూడదనే అనుకుంటున్నారు ఎందుకంటే లైన్‍లో నిలుచోవడం చాలా కష్టంగా ఉంటుంది ప్రతి ఒక్కరికి లైన్‍లో నిలుచోని ఓపీ [OP] తీసుకోని డాక్టర్ [doctor] దగ్గరకు వెళ్దాము అంటే డాక్టర్లు ఆ టైంకి ఉండరు అదే అని చెప్పి సాయంత్రం వరకూ లైన్‍లో నిలుచోవడం చాలా కష్టం కదా

src_sent:
In Telangana, the business culture, as well as the business culture in the region, has many unique features that are also found in the rest of India. In our Telangana, the main focus is on culture and tradition. There is a deep connection between tradition and culture in the business culture of Telangana. Our people in Telangana do business without forgetting our traditions. They go to great lengths to do business while maintaining traditional values and incorporating modern business practices. For example, some people run family businesses, while others run community-based businesses or entrepreneurial ventures.

In Telangana, agriculture plays a significant role, but it is not typically considered a business. However, agriculture influences business in Telangana, and we can do business in agriculture as well. For instance, crops like paddy, cotton, chili, turmeric, and others are cultivated in suitable lands, and there are agriculture-based industries like trading and processing that support these crops. Compared to other countries or states, I think there are more businesses related to agriculture in Telangana because agriculture is the mainstay here.

In addition to traditional agricultural practices, we also incorporate modern techniques and focus on sustainable agriculture. Farmers and agro-based industries are common here. Another significant sector in Telangana is the IT industry, with Hyderabad being a prime example of industrial growth in India. The IT industry, including multinational companies, IT parks, and startups, is thriving here. To support modern business and cultural development, there are also educational institutions, government policies, and regional business communities.

In Telangana, specific business communities are prominent, and they are often based on caste, such as Reddys, Aryas, Vaishyas, and others. These communities encourage entrepreneurship, networking, and financial support, influencing the business culture. They provide support for marketing, financial assistance, and other aspects of business. Government policies, such as TS-iPASS, which involves land pooling for industries, also play a significant role in promoting business and entrepreneurship in Telangana.

The entrepreneurial spirit is strong in Telangana, and people are willing to take risks to achieve their goals. This spirit is deeply ingrained in the Telugu people, who are known for their courage and determination.

[Sniffle] ఎట్లా అంటే ఇక్కడ తెలంగాణలో మెయిన్‌గా ఇచ్చేది కల్చర్ [culture] కల్చర్ [culture] అండ్ [and] ట్రెడిషన్‌కే ఎక్కువ ఇస్తారు తెలంగాణలో బిజినెస్ కల్చర్‌లో ట్రెడిషన్‌ అండ్ కల్చర్‌కి ఒక డీప్ కనెక్షన్ అనేది ఉంటది ఎట్లా అంటే మన తెలంగాణ వాళ్ళు మన పరంపరలని మర్చిపోకుండా బిజినెస్‌ని చేసేవారు [stammers] బిజినెస్‌ని చేసే వరకు వెళ్ళిపోతారు ఎట్లా అంటే ట్రెడిషనల్ వాల్యూస్‌కి కూడా మోడర్న్ బిజినెస్ ప్రాక్టీసెస్‌కి ఒక ఇంటిగ్రిటీ అయి ఉంటది ఎట్లా అంటే ఫ్యామిలీ రన్ చేస్తారు కదా కొందరు ఇంటర్ [uhh] అదే ఆ౦టర్‌ప్రెన్యుర్‌షిప్స్ కమ్యూనిటి బేస్డ్ బిజినెస్‌ని కొన్ని చేస్తుంటరు ఇంకా తెలంగాణలో అగ్రికల్చర్ అనేది మెయిన్‌గా మెయిన్ రోల్‌గా ఉంటుంది కాకపోతే అది బిజినెస్ కిందికి రాదు కాకపోతే మెయిన్‌గా అయితే తెలంగాణలో వచ్చేది అగ్రికల్చర్ [Sniffle] ఎట్లా అంటే తెలంగాణలో అగ్రికల్చర్ ముఖ్యంగా బిజినెస్‌ని ఇంఫ్లుయెన్స్ చేస్తుంది లైక్ అగ్రికల్చర్‌లో కూడా మనం బిజినెస్ చేయొచ్చు ఎట్లా అంటే ప్యాడీ కాటన్ మిర్చి ఇట్ల టర్మరిక్ ఇంకా వేరే క్రాప్స్ కల్చివేషన్స్‌కి సూటబుల్ ల్యాండ్స్‌కున్న ఏరియాలో అగ్రికల్చర్ బేస్డ్ ఇండస్ట్రీస్ [industries] కొన్నుంటాయి లైక్ [like] ట్రేడింగ్ [trading] ప్రాసెసింగ్ [processing] చేస్తూ అంటే ఆ అగ్రికల్చర్‌కు ఏమేమి కావాలో అలాంటి బిజినెస్‌లు చేస్తూ ఉంటారు లైక్ [like] వేరే కంట్రీ src_sent:
I want to try cooking Bongu Chicken, Shawarma, and Rumali Roti, but it's proving to be a challenging task. To make Bongu Chicken, I need bamboo shoots, but I don't know where to find them. I've tried searching online, even on Amazon, but I couldn't find any. I've heard that bamboo shoots are available in the forests near Araku, but that's too far from my place. I really want to try cooking Bongu Chicken, but I'm not sure where to start.

As for Shawarma, I've had friends tell me that it's delicious, but I'm hesitant to try it from outside because I'm not sure what kind of meat they use. I want to make it at home, but I don't have the right equipment. I'm not sure where to find the equipment, and even if I do, I'm not sure if I can make it taste as good as the ones available outside.

Rumali Roti is another dish I want to try making, but it seems like a difficult task. I've seen people making it by tossing the dough in the air and catching it, but I'm not sure if I can do that. I'm used to making chapatis on a tava, but Rumali Roti is a different story altogether. I want to learn how to make it, but it's going to take some practice.

Despite the challenges, I'm determined to learn how to make these dishes. I want to try new things and experiment with different flavors. I hope that someday I'll be able to make Bongu Chicken, Shawarma, and Rumali Roti like a pro.
tgt_sent: బొంగు చికెన్ [chicken] ఒకటి షవరమా [Shawarma] ఒకటి రుమాలి [rumali] రోటి [roti] ఒకటి నాకు చాలా కష్టమైన పని అయిపోయిందండి అవి నేర్చుకోవాలనుకుంటే అవ్వటం లేదు బొంగు చికెన్ [chicken] వండుదామంటే బొంగు దొరకటం లేదు అండి పచ్చి వెదురు బొంగు ఎక్కడ దొరుకుతాయి చెప్పండి వె ఎక్కడో అరకు వెళ్ళే రూట్‍లో అవన్నీ అడవులు కాబట్టి అక్కడ దొరుకుతాయి మనకు ఇళ్ళ దగ్గర ఎక్కడ దొరుకుతుంది అండి అక్కడికి అమెజాన్‍లో కూడా నేను ట్రై [try] చేశాను పచ్చి వెదురు బొంగు దొరుకుతుంది ఏమోనని కానీ అందులో ఏం ఎలా ట్రై [try] చేసినా కూడా చూపించటం లేదు అండి ఎప్పటికైనా సరే బొంగు చికెన్ [chicken] వండాలండి వండి టేస్ట్ [taste] చేయాలి నేను ఇప్పుడు వరకు టేస్ట్ [taste] చేయలేదండి నేనే వండుకుని తినాలని డిసైడ్ [decide] అయ్యి ఇప్పటివరకు కూడా [noise] వండటానికి కూడా ట్రై [try] చేయలేదు అలాగే షవరమా [Shawarma] అండి షవరమా [Shawarma] వండాలంటే మాటలా అండి మామూలు మాటలు కాదు అవి బయట షవరమా [Shawarma] దొరుకుతుంది మా ఫ్రెండ్స్ [friends] తెలిసిన వాళ్ళు తింటుంటారు అండి చాలా బాగుంటుంది ట్రై [try] చేయమంటారు కానీ నా పిచ్చి ఏంటంటే అందులో వేరే వేరే మీట్స్ [meats] ఏమైనా కలిపి వేస్తాడేమో అని భయమండి [laughter] అందుకని ఇప్పుడు వరకు కూడా బయట ఎక్కడ షవరమా టేస్ట్ [taste] చేయలేదు అదికూడా ఇంట్లో తయారు చేసే తినాలని అనుకున్నాను కానీ ఆ ఎక్విప్మెంట్స్ [Equipments] అయి ఎక్కడ దొరుకుతాయి చెప్పండి మనకి అవి దొరకాలే అప్పుడు నేను ట్రై [try] చేయాలి ఆ వంట కూడా చాలా కష్టమండి ఇంక రుమాలి [rumali] రోటి [roti] అంటారా అమ్మో దాని తయారు చెయ్యాలంటే రోటీలు గాల్లో ఎగరేసుకుంటూ చెయ్యాలండి ఏదో చపాతీలు అంటే పీట మీద ఒత్తేసి కాల్చేస్తాం కానీ రోమాలి [rumali] రోటి [roti] అలా కాదు కదండి అమ్మో దాన్ని చేయటం కూడా చాలా కష్టమైన పనండి కానీ ఎప్పటికైనా నేర్చుకోవాలండి నేర్చుకుని ఈ మూడు వంటలు కూడా వండుకుని టేస్ట్ [taste] చేయాలని అనుకుంటున్నాను

src_sent:
When visiting Andhra Pradesh, tourists can try various popular outdoor recreational activities. There are many outdoor recreational activities and adventure sports in Andhra Pradesh, such as river rafting. Rivers and canals are found in many places in Andhra Pradesh, where river rafting is a prominent adventure activity. Tourists go rafting on the rivers, gaining unique experiences. Many tourists also enjoy boat rides on the rivers. Some tourists perform stunts on small boats, showcasing their adventurous side.

Another must-visit attraction is the Indira Gandhi Zoological Park. The Indira Gandhi Zoological Park is a prominent tourist attraction in Andhra Pradesh, where tourists can enjoy zoo rides and other recreational activities with great interest.

Mountain biking is another popular activity in Andhra Pradesh, with many areas suitable for this adventure sport. Tourists can explore the scenic trails, enjoying the natural beauty of the region. For nature lovers, there are many more attractions, such as Highland and Wonderla, which offer various thrilling rides.

Andhra Pradesh has many more attractions, including temples, parks, beaches, and oceans. There are numerous places to visit, making Andhra Pradesh a wonderful destination for tourists.

src_sent:
We follow certain methods to keep our home and surrounding areas clean and hygienic. First, every morning, the women in our household, my mother, starts sweeping the front porch or the open area in front of our house, all the way to the road. This is because when we come from outside, we bring in a lot of dirt, dust, and leaves into the house. So, they start sweeping from the road and work their way inwards, collecting all the dirt and dust, and then dispose of it in the trash can.

We also separate our trash into wet and dry waste, and put them in separate bins. Every day, we put out these bins, and the municipal trash collection van comes to collect the waste. They take the waste and leave the bins back in front of our house. We make sure to rinse the bins and keep them clean.

We also make sure to clean the drainage system in front of our house regularly. The municipality sends people to clean the drains every two days, but we have to make sure they do it properly. If they don't, I take it upon myself to clean it. We have to keep the drains clean because if they get clogged, mosquitoes will breed, and we'll have to deal with diseases like typhoid and fever.

We also make sure that there is no stagnant water around our house. If there is, mosquitoes will breed, and we'll have to deal with diseases. So, we keep the area around our house clean and dry.

To keep our house clean, we also keep a bucket of water outside the front door. Whenever we come from outside, we wash our feet before entering the house. This helps to reduce the amount of dirt and dust that enters the house.

We also plant flowers and trees in front of our house. This not only keeps the air clean but also makes the area look beautiful. We make sure to water the plants regularly and keep the soil clean.

By following these methods, we keep our home and surrounding areas clean and hygienic. This is important for our health and well-being.
